website_summaries.verdict: An advanced fish finder and HD camera system that has all the right parts to get the job done, but lacks quality and features to make it great.
pros: The seven-inch monitor is good size for viewing
Strong battery life and pretty good night shooting capabilities
The camera is able to take video and photo
The 12 LED lights provide day and night vision, and can be turned on and off as needed
cons: The camera struggles quite a bit in murky waters

customer_reviews.title: Very interesting little camera.
customer_reviews.text: It is really cool to see the fish under the water when Ice fishing, but can't see far on dirty water is the only problem.
customer_reviews.author: miner89

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, Mine came with the power cord ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, Mine came with the power cord, recharging cord and all of the cords I needed for operation. Some reviews said they had to buy separate cords. I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: fish camera
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with picture and easy adjustment of this fish camera. Battery is adequate but the 12 v is easily obtained from the boat battery if a connector is found. Only problem is winding up the spool of wire after use. I could of used just 50 ft max.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift I don't personally use it he made a few modifications and is happy
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bloom

customer_reviews.title: It was all good, the instructions are not very clear
customer_reviews.text: It was all good,the instructions are not very clear. I think it was written by a third world person.
customer_reviews.author: William V.

customer_reviews.title: Underwater camera
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product was as good as they claimed... Can't wait for ice fishing season this year
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Picture quality is descent. Needs a better positioning system.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than i thought it would nothing bad to say
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not In original box, and no instructions in closed
customer_reviews.text: Was not in original box, also there was no paperwork with the item. I was E-mailed a set of instructions, which had very little instructions. Also there where shipping stickers on the item. Which I'm sure would have been hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Relue

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product does work like they doesn't get any stores at all and review
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Works Good. the darker the water the better it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Qwho2002

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described. But lacking detailed instructions on operation. Particularly how to charge battery.
customer_reviews.author: Snkdr196

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems good have not gotten to use it at night yet. It works well in the daytime though.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

product_meta.title: BOBLOV 7 Inch 1000TVL 30m IR Fish Finder Underwater Video Fishing Camera Equipment
feature_bullets: 7 inch TFT color monitor with sun-visor for bright environment outside。with removable sunshield
Application field: monitoring aquaculture, underwater exploration, Ocean/Ice/Lake fishing swimming/diving/snorkeling are all available
